destination: Leave Earth Far Behind: A Mission to Mars
description: Our most popular cruise - Spend 7 days amongst off the only world you have ever known. The full mission includes a 3 day journey to our port, a full (Earth) day on planet, and a 3 day journey back.

destination: One small step into space: A Moon Adventure
description: You've spent every night gazing up at our favorite rock that orbits our planet - why not finally set foot on it? The full mission includes a 1 day journey to our port, a full (Earth) day on planet, and a 1 day journey back.
